name: CDScience
description: Winner of Business Journal’s Startup Of The Year 2014, CDScience provides next-generation commerce technology that allows businesses to deliver ecommerce everywhere. Our Universal Retail APIs organize millions of the most trending ecommerce products from the world’s top retailers and delivers product feeds through a unified set of APIs that help businesses drive revenues through ecommerce and targeted mobile ads.  Our Universal Wishlists and Price Notification Engine provides radical re-engagement tools that continually drive users back into clients’  apps. Our proprietary indexing engines track over a billion data points on millions of ecommerce products daily. Our platforms are uniquely designed to graph explicit purchase intent coupled with the effects of price deltas, social chatter and influencer impact on retail trends and purchase conversions.
